channel.title: Themes on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Themes on Arrans github.io

item.title: ohmyzsh/ohmyzsh
item.description: ðŸ™ƒ A delightful community-driven (with 2,400+ contributors) framework for managing your zsh configuration. Includes 300+ optional plugins (rails, git, macOS, hub, docker, homebrew, node, php, python, etc), 140+ themes to spice up your morning, and an auto-update tool that makes it easy to keep up with the latest updates from the community.

item.title: solworktech/md2pdf
item.description: A CLI utility that generates PDFs from Markdown. Features: syntax highlighting (for code blocks), dark, light and custom themes, TOC autogeneration,tables, pagination control (using horizontal lines - especially useful for presentations), page Footer (consisting of author, title and page number), support of non-Latin charsets and multiple font
